<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stage Fright Missive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2066)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Missive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=485" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 22 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Composing a _stage fright missive_ usually involves creating a scathing review, insulting letter, or embarrassing image that ridicules the recipient. The activating creature must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or be overcome with embarrassment for 1 hour, taking a –1 status penalty to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. During this time, if the creature attempts to speak or perform in front of an audience, they become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). When they recover from this sickened condition, the missive's effects end. You choose when composing the missive whether it remains as a non-magical document or burns to ash after imparting its magic.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
